messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling Unmanual
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hooee, this is *exactly* what I ve been waiting for to read to Ryan!!! Jodi BRIAN POLIKOWSKY  wrote: I got mine yesterday and
messages.messageBody:
>A gold mine for skeptical dads.

Hooee, this is *exactly* what I've been waiting for to read to Ryan!!!

Jodi

BRIAN POLIKOWSKY <polykowholsteins@...> wrote:
I got mine yesterday and this is what I sent to Jan Hunt this morning:



Dear Jan and Jason,
I got my book yesterday and I had it in my hand all day until I finished!!!!!!!!!
I loved it!
You know Jan I do not have any doubts about unschooling but if I had any trace they are totally gone now.
It is a perfect book to have in your bedside table when you start doubting yourself.
Perfect for new unschoolers and old unschoolers.
A gold mine for skeptical dads.
Thank you for it,
Alex
(Still feeling the joy from reading it!)

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]






---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Dear Jan and Jason,
I got my book yesterday and I had it in my hand all day until I finished!!!!!!!!!

You know Jan I do not have any doubts about unschooling but if I had any trace they are totally gone now.
